sentences.sContent: Gladys was crippled by polio at the age of 3.
sentences.sCn: 格拉迪丝3岁时因小儿麻痹症而瘸了。

synos.tran: 小儿麻痹症（等于poliomyelitis）；脊髓灰质炎

trans.tranCn: 小儿麻痹症（等于poliomyelitis）；脊髓灰质炎
trans.tranOther: a serious infectious disease of the nerves in the  spine  , that often results in someone being permanently unable to move particular muscles
